loan.name: Jean De Dieu
loan.use: to buy rice, oil, sugar, as well as other products to resell in the market and to also buy seeds, fertilizer, and manure for farming.
loan.description:
Jean De Dieu is a father of a family and aged 46. He is married and has two dependent children. He lives in an area not far from the town center. He has worked in various domains for approximately the past 11 years. He and his partner work together to have a better standard of living.

He runs a grocery store and also farms rice, corn, soy, and beans.

Jean De Dieu is a good partner of Vahatra. Previously, he bought a bunk bed with his profits. He wishes to strengthen his bsuiness and farming to earn more profits. He resells basic goods in his area. His grocery store is really successful. He does his farming out in the countryside.

Jean De Dieu wants to make even more profits. He is seeking lender support to finance his work. He is going to buy sacks of white rice, drums of oil, sugar, as well as other goods to resell in the market. In addition, he is also going to buy seeds, fertilizer, and manure for his farming.

He hopes to buy a house in the near future.
loan.whySpecial: It helps the poorest of the poor in Madagascar to improve their lives.
